text: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men.
author: E. B. White

text: Men are freest when they are most unconscious of freedom. The shout is a rattling of chains, always was.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

text: Men won't read any email from a woman that's over 200 words long.
author: Doug Coupland

text: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education.
author: Walter Scott

text: There would be no great men if there were no little ones.
author: George Herbert
